list.description: Lister tous les flux et leurs canaux.

locale.description: Modifie la langue qu'Atlas utilise sur votre serveur.

serverinfo.description: Obtenir des informations √† propos du serveur.

quote.description: Quote a message by a user.

minecraft.description: Checks the status of a Minecraft server.

memberCount.description: Shows information about the servers member count.

joined.description: Find out when a user joined the server.

embed.description: Embeds a message. You can use "advancedembed" for more options.

advancedembed.description: Embeds a message with advanced options.

discrim.description: Gets users with a discriminator that matches yours.

user.description: Gets the avatar of a user.

server.description: Gets the avatar of the server.

trump.description: Gets something stupid Donald Trump has said.

urban.description: Gets the definition for a word.

randomurban.description: Gets a random definition from Urban Dictionary.

gotcharacter.description: Gets information about a Game of Thrones character. Run without args to get a random character.

gothouse.description: Gets information about a Game of Thrones house. Run without args to get a random house.

kick.description: Removes a member from the server.

action.description: Used to enable or disable filters, and change their action.

list.description: Lists filters and their current settings.

base.description: Controls where certain messages are logged in your guild.

actions.description: Sets where action logs are logged to. Run with no args to reset.

endswith.description: Purges messages that end with [term]. Supports wild*cards.

invites.description: Purges messages containing Discord server invite links.

includes.description: Purges messages that includes your term  Supports wild*cards.

not.description: Purges messages that do not include your term. Supports wild*cards.

startswith.description: Purges messages that start with your term. Supports wild*cards.

user.description: Purges messages that are from the user specified.

slowmode.description: Enables message rate limiting for the channel. Set to 0 or enter "disable" to disable slowmode entirely.

coinflip.description: Flips a coin that can land heads or tails.

move.description: Moves a message to another channel.

botinfo.description: Gets information about almost any public bot via discordbots.org.

leave.description: Leaves the voice channel and dumps the queue.

unban.description: Unban a user from the guild.

emojify.description: Converts regular sentences to awesome emojified sentences üéâ

mute.description: Stops a user sending messages while they're muted.

next.description: Goes to the next song in the queue.

show.description: Search for information about a TV Series.

weather.description: Get weather information from anywhere in the world.

catfact.description: Who doesn't like facts about cats?

cat.description: Kittens, cats, you name it - we've got it (maybe).

dog.description: Dogs. Just random pictures of dogs.

advice.description: Need quality life advice from a source you can trust? Then this isn't the command for you.

base.description: Manage warnings. Warn users for bad behaviour, edit previous warnings a user has and more.

add.description: Add a warning to a user.

funban.description: Bans a user but it's fun (and slightly spammy)

ban.description: Bans a user, exactly what it says on the tin.

submit.description: Submit suggestions to the suggestion channel.

donate.description: Donate to support Atlas and get awesome perks!
donate.fullDescription: Support Atlas by becoming a Patreon and get awesome perks in return!

help.description: View all of Atlas' commands or get help for a specific command or plugin.

yesno.description: Yes or no? Gets a random yes or no randomly.

ping.description: Check the time Atlas takes to reply to you!

support.description: Need help with Atlas? Join our Support server!

uptime.description: Check how long Atlas has been online for.

nowplaying.description: Shows information about the song currently playing.

play.description: Plays a song in your current voice channel, now with built in playlist support!

qplaylist.description: Adds songs from a YouTube playlist to the queue.

queue.description: Shows upcoming songs in the player queue.

trumpgen.description: Generate an image of Trump's twitter tweeting something.

remindme.description: Set reminders to get notified in the future.
remindme.fullDescription: Set reminders to get notified in the future. Where [time] is in your sentence doesn't really matter. Atlas may round up the time it says but the actual time will be accurate.

captcha.description: Are you a robot? I know I am.

invite.description: Get Atlas in your own server by inviting me!

8ball.description: Ask the magic eight-ball a question.
